definitions.definition: A piece of verse with a simple , songlike rhythm .
An informal gathering at which songs are sung; a singing session .
examples: We gathered round the campfire for a little singsong .

definitions.definition: A drawling or monotonous tone , as of a poorly executed song .

main_definition: A piece of verse with a simple , songlike rhythm .
secondary_definitions: An informal gathering at which songs are sung; a singing session .
A drawling or monotonous tone , as of a poorly executed song .
